name: WhoaLife
description: A private, once a day diary that emails you to ask, 'How did your day go?'.

scripts.postdeploy: heroku pg:psql -c 'create table entries (createdat timestamp with time zone, text text); insert into entries values (now(), "Today I started my WhoaLife diary.");'

JWT_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of JWT authentication tokens.

NAME.description: Your name. Emails to you will include your name. Computers are amazing!

EMAIL.description: Your email address. Daily messages will be sent here.

TZ.description: The timezone you live in, so that dates and times are correct. There's a list at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones
